Responsibilities: Develop and implement comprehensive social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement, and website traffic. Create and curate engaging content for various social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn. Monitor and analyze social media performance metrics to track progress and identify areas for improvement. Manage social media advertising campaigns, including budgeting, targeting, and optimization. Manage Marketplace like Amazon, Flip cart and other. (Account opening, Product listing, ads and Festival sales)  Preferred candidate profile   Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field. 4-5 years of experience in social media management, with a proven track record of growing social media accounts and driving engagement. Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a creative flair for content creation. Proficiency in using social media management tools and analytics platforms. Excellent organizational skills and ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines. Knowledge of social media advertising best practices and experience with ad creation and optimization. Ability to adapt to changing priorities and thrive in a fast-paced environment. Perks and benefits

column2: We are looking for a dynamic and creative Digital Marketing Manager to manage the digital marketing team and execute digital marketing initiatives for our portfolio ventures. The role of the Digital Marketing Manager would involve the following responsibilities:   Role and Responsibilities      Coordinating with the management team to understand the vision and mission for digital marketing and sales.         Executing keyword Research for different ventures and competitors of the company.         Strategizing and executing SEO activities for different ventures of the company.         Strategizing and executing Social Media Marketing for different ventures of the company.         Executing Content marketing including PR Outreach for different ventures of the company.         Executing Online prospect generation through different channels for different ventures of the company.           Managing the team of executives, contractual employees, interns, freelancers and affiliate vendor companies.           Any other activities required by the company.     Detailed Activities        Marketing Strategy & Planning:    Understanding the company s ventures and their respective products and services. Analyzing the current state of the business along with its competitive positioning. Analyzing the target market and client personas in detail to strategize various online sales and marketing activities.           Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Activities:    Researching target keywords of various ventures along with their respective competitors. Analyzing and monitoring SEO metrics such as Domain Authority, visits, conversions, backlinks, etc. including on-page and off-page SEO of the websites. Strategizing the SEO activities and carrying them out with the team. Ensuring high-end backlinking and ranking on search engines for relevant keywords.           Social Media Marketing (SMM) Activities:    Managing social media handles along with online reputation management for our ventures. Strategizing and executing social media activities such as social posts, sharing news, and increasing reach along with engagements.           Content Marketing Activities:    This would involve content creation and distribution of various content such as articles, blog posts, videos, infographics, and images. Using article writing tools to create relevant and engaging content for our blogs as well as guest postings for other distribution sites. Optimizing content for SEO using strategies and tools. Engaging with other blogs, creating relationships, and distributing articles on their platform.           PR Outreach Activities:    Carry out PR outreach activities to get media coverage and media mentions. column2: We are looking for a dynamic individual to fill the role of Social Media and Email Marketing Coordinator       This position is pivotal in driving engagement, brand visibility, and conversions through both social media and targeted email campaigns, with a focus on our corporate presence and technology products across various platforms     The ideal candidate will possess a blend of creative flair, strategic thinking, and analytical acumen to effectively manage and enhance our digital marketing efforts                      Key Duties:             Develop and execute comprehensive social media and email marketing strategies to increase brand visibility, customer engagement, and revenue generation for both B2B and D2C segments.         Craft compelling content for social media posts, newsletters, promotional offers, event invitations, and automated drip campaigns that resonate with our target audience.         Manage and schedule posts across multiple social media platforms, including Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, and interact with followers, respond to comments and messages in real-time or as soon as possible to connect with Cineverse community members.         Monitor social media channels and email performance metrics (such as email deliverability, open rates, click-through rates, and other key performance indicators (KPIs) to track effectiveness, identify trends, and optimize strategies for maximum impact.         Foster engagement by interacting with followers, responding to comments and messages promptly, and cultivating meaningful connections with our community.         Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and product development, to align digital marketing initiatives with overall business objectives and initiatives.         Stay abreast of industry trends, best practices, and regulatory requirements related to social media and email marketing, ensuring compliance with relevant laws such as GDPR and CAN-SPAM.         Willing to work in US hours in a WFH set up along with flexible to report to the office as and when required.                             Essential Qualifications/Competencies:             Bachelors degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field preferred.         Proven hands-on experience of 5 years of managing social media accounts and email campaigns for businesses or organizations, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful campaigns and engagement.         Proficiency in social media management tools such as Hootsuite, Buffer, or Sprout Social, as well as email marketing platforms like Zoho Campaigns, Mailchimp, or similar CRM systems.         Experience using Wordpress, or similar content management systems.         Strong understanding of social media and email marketing best practices, including audience segmentation, A/B testing, personalization, and automation.         Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail and ability to maintain brand consistency across all channels.         Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven recommendations to optimize campaign performance.         Creative thinker with a passion for staying ahead of digital marketing trends and emerging platforms.         Ability to multitask, prioritize responsibilities, and work effectively in a fast-paced environment while collaborating with cross-functional teams.

column2: A Digital Marketing Executive plays a key role in planning, executing, and optimizing digital marketing strategies to promote products, services, or the overall brand of a company. Heres a typical job description for a Digital Marketing Executive:          **Responsibilities:**          1. **Develop and Implement Digital Marketing Strategies:**          - Plan and execute comprehensive digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including social media, email, content marketing, and search engine optimization (SEO).          - Stay updated on the latest trends and technologies in digital marketing to ensure effective and innovative campaigns.          2. **Social Media Management:**          - Manage and grow the companys presence on social media platforms.          - Create engaging and shareable content tailored for each platform.          - Monitor and analyze social media metrics to measure the success of campaigns and make data-driven decisions.          3. **Content Creation and Marketing:**          - Develop compelling and high-quality content for various digital channels, including blog posts, articles, infographics, and videos.          - Coordinate content marketing initiatives to drive brand awareness and customer engagement.          4. **Search Engine Optimization (SEO):**          - Optimize website content for search engines to improve organic visibility and rankings.          - Conduct keyword research and analysis to identify opportunities for content optimization.          5. **Email Marketing:**          - Plan and execute email marketing campaigns, including designing templates, writing copy, and analyzing performance metrics.          - Build and manage email lists, ensuring compliance with regulations and best practices.          6. **Analytics and Reporting:**          - Monitor and analyze the performance of digital marketing campaigns using tools like Google Analytics.          - Prepare regular reports showcasing key performance indicators and actionable insights.          7. **Paid Advertising:**          - Manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and other relevant channels.          - Optimize ad performance through A/B testing and continuous monitoring.          8. **Collaboration and Coordination:**          - Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, design, and product development, to align marketing strategies with overall business goals.          - Coordinate with external vendors and agencies as needed.          **Requirements:**          1. Proven experience as a Digital Marketing Executive or similar role.          2. Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, tools, and techniques.          3. Familiarity with marketing automation tools and customer relationship management (CRM) systems.          4. Excellent written and verbal communication skills.          5. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.          6. Creative thinking and problem-solving skills.          7. Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.          **Preferred Qualifications:**          1. Certification in digital marketing or related fields.          2. Experience in industries relevant to the companys products or services.          3. Familiarity with e-commerce and online retail environments.

column2: You re on top of the latest trends and why it matters, and you always have examples of excellent content ideas up your sleeve. You ll be great at creating a variety of content across web, print, blog posts, direct mail and emails to drive brand awareness and support customer acquisition. This will consist of both written and visual content, informed by data metrics to improve engagement and optimise performance whether it s clicks, likes, follows or lead generation.         You ll also be social media enthusiastic, working with our Digital Designer and creating regular posts for our platforms to grow and engage our followers.         You will need strong communication skills to be able to work with agencies or third parties to push our content and increase brand awareness         You re able to pick things up quickly, like our CMS platform to create new landing pages or our CRM platform to create content for email campaigns.         Like us, you re enthusiastic about data you re able to draw insight from data metrics and performance for your content, improving engagement and driving campaign KPI performance.         Able to work well in team projects and autonomously, taking initiative to come up with ideas to regularly create and publish new content you re passionate about across our platforms. Excellent time management is key you ll have the ability maintain your own content schedule and work across a diverse number of projects, solving problems and managing shifting priorities, whilst working to deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Requirements                 Currently pursuing a degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field (or recent graduate).         Demonstrated passion for social media and a solid understanding of major social media platforms.         Familiarity with social media management tools and analytics platforms (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer, Sprout Social, Google Analytics).         Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail.         Basic graphic design skills and experience using design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Photoshop) are a plus.         Ability to work independently, manage multiple tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.         Creative thinking and a proactive mindset to propose innovative ideas and solutions.         Familiarity with SEO principles and content marketing is a plus.         Basic knowledge of digital advertising and paid social media campaigns is a plus.                 Benefits        Hands-on Experience: As a Social Media Intern, you will have the opportunity to gain practical experience in social media marketing, working closely with industry professionals. This hands-on experience will enhance your understanding of social media strategies, content creation, community management, analytics, and more.              Skill Development: Throughout your internship, you will sharpen various skills that are highly valuable in todays digital landscape. These skills include content creation, copywriting, social media analytics, community management, and effective communication. You will also have the chance to develop your creative thinking, problem-solving, and collaboration abilities.             Professional Growth: Working in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, you will encounter real-world challenges and learn how to adapt to changing trends and industry demands. Your contributions and insights will be valued, providing you with a sense of ownership and responsibility. You will receive guidance and mentorship, allowing for personal and professional growth.             Networking Opportunities: Collaborating with a diverse team, including marketing professionals, designers, and content creators, will expose you to various perspectives and skillsets. This experience will expand your professional network and enable you to make valuable connections that can support your future career endeavors.             Portfolio Enhancement: Through your involvement in creating engaging social media content and campaigns, you will have the opportunity to build a strong portfolio. The work you produce during your internship can be showcased as evidence of your skills, creativity, and ability to drive results. This portfolio will be a valuable asset when applying for future roles in the industry.             Insight into Industry Best Practices: As you actively contribute to the social media strategies and campaigns, you will gain valuable insights into industry best practices. Staying up-to-date with the latest trends and emerging platforms will give you a competitive edge in the field of social media marketing.             Learning Environment: We are committed to providing a supportive and inclusive learning environment during your internship. You will have access to resources, training materials, and opportunities for continuous learning. We encourage curiosity, questions, and the exploration of new ideas.             Future Opportunities: Successful completion of the internship may open doors for future employment opportunities within our organization or serve as a stepping stone to other roles in the industry. We value the contributions of our interns and are committed to recognizing and rewarding talent

Research and Analysis:   Conduct research on industry trends, competitive analysis, and customer insights to provide recommendations on improving the company s digital marketing strategy. Overall, as a Digital Marketing Intern, you will be responsible for supporting the marketing team in executing digital marketing campaigns, analyzing data, and contributing to the company s overall marketing strategy. SEO and SEM: Collaborate with the team to improve search engine rankings through on-page and off-page optimization, as well as manage pay-per-click (PPC) advertising campaigns. Lead Generation: Contribute to lead generation efforts through online channels, such as email marketing, social media, and landing page optimization.         Online Reputation Management: Assist in maintaining a positive online reputation for clients by addressing customer reviews and feedback across various platforms.         Market Research: Conduct market research to identify trends, competitor activities, and opportunities to improve marketing strategies.         Collaborative Support: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including design, content, and web development, to ensure cohesive and successful digital campaigns. column2: English Browne India Limited is a leading company in the Health & Hygiene FMCG Industry, dedicated to delivering high-quality products and services to our customers. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we are seeking a talented Digital Marketing Manager to join our team and drive our digital marketing initiatives forward. This role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to our online presence and enhance our brand visibility in the digital space. Job Summary: The Digital Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to promote English Browne India Limited's products and services online. Key responsibilities include managing remarketing efforts, optimizing Google AdWords campaigns, running targeted campaigns to generate leads and revenue, and promoting sales through various online channels. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in digital marketing and a proven track record of driving results in an online environment. Responsibilities: Remarketing: Develop and implement remarketing strategies to target and re-engage with website visitors who have shown interest in English Browne India Limited's products or services. Utilize remarketing platforms and techniques to deliver personalized ads to segmented audiences and drive conversions. Google AdWords: Manage and optimize Google AdWords campaigns to maximize ROI and achieve advertising objectives. Conduct keyword research, ad copywriting, and bid management to ensure optimal performance of AdWords campaigns. Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics, such as click-through rates (CTR) and conversion rates, and make data-driven adjustments as needed. Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and monitor targeted digital marketing campaigns across various online channels, including social media, email, and display advertising. Develop creative and compelling campaign messaging and visuals to effectively communicate English Browne India Limited's value proposition to target audiences. Track campaign performance and KPIs, such as leads generated and revenue generated, and provide regular reports to stakeholders. Lead Generation and Revenue Generation: Implement lead generation strategies to capture and nurture leads through online channels. Work closely with the sales team to ensure seamless lead handoff and follow-up processes. Optimize online sales funnels to drive conversions and maximize revenue generation opportunities. Online Sales Promotion: Develop and execute online sales promotion strategies to stimulate demand and drive sales of English Browne India Limited's products and services. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product marketing and e-commerce, to create compelling promotions and incentives for online customers. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field. Proven experience in digital marketing with a focus on remarketing, Google AdWords, and campaign management. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Creative thinker with the ability to develop innovative digital marketing strategies. Results-oriented mindset with a track record of driving leads and revenue through online channels. Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including Google Ads, Google Analytics, and remarketing platforms. Join us at English Browne India Limited and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to excellence and innovation in the Health and Hygiene FMCG Industry. If you are passionate about digital marketing and have a proven track record of driving results online, we want to hear from you! Apply now by submitting your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and qualifications

column2: ?     We are looking for a Social Media Manager who can build strong online communities through our various social media platforms.
